trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Centennial
There were no other sightings in Centennial on or around April 20th 2007
Summary: falling object from south to north, largely green with some red as it disappeared from view. seemed to have sparks coming from it
divs: Sighting DetailsWalking east to west just after 11:00 PM MDT when I watched a green object shoot across the sky in a downward trajectory (not straight down, more like across the sky disappearing from my view at about 4 o'clock), with some red, and sparks appeared to be emanating from it. The whole sighting took less than 10 seconds. I could not help but notice it. At first I thought it might be a shooting star, but it was way too close for that. Then it ocurred to me to be a meteorite. Or perhaps a remnant of some fireoworks. I have no pictures.
